channel.title: Grep on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Grep on TLDRBins

item.title: Grep
item.description: Basic grep 'text' file.txt Grep from files recursively (e.g from current directory) grep -rni 'text' . Grep from binary grep -a 'text' binary Grep hash from binary with perl regex grep -aPo '[a-fA-F0-9]{32}' binary Grep from binaries recusively (e.g. from /var/log) sudo grep -rHa "password" /var/log Find unique char of a file cat file.txt | od -cvA none -w1 | sort -bu | tr -d '\n' | tr -d ' '
